question: Explain the economic impact of reducing fossil fuel subsidies.
true_answer: Reducing fossil fuel subsidies generally reduces economic reliance on carbon-intensive industries and can encourage investment in renewable energy, but may also increase energy costs in the short-term.

errors: Initial decomposition error propagated to sub-agent tasks, leading to incorrect focus.
